entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a character who held the door open for Harry Potter. He whistled to summon a small cart.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a character who was surprised by the narrow stone passage-way. He tried to remember the path but it was impossible.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a character who had difficulty climbing into the cart.

relationships.description: Griphook controlled the small cart that came hurtling up the tracks towards them.
Harry Potter experienced a narrow stone passage-way lit with flaming torches.
